create-modal.title: Create client
create-modal.description: The client will receive an activationlink in the company email inbox.
create-modal.toast-success: {{client}} has been created as a client
create-modal.email-description: An activation link will be sent to the company emails inbox

validation.company-min: Company name must be at least {{minLength}} characters

create-action-errors.client-exists: A company with that email already exists
create-action-errors.user-exists: A user with that email already exists
create-action-errors.client-not-created: An error occurred when creating client
create-action-errors.location-not-created: An error occurred when creating a location for client
create-action-errors.mail-not-sent: An error occurred when sending activation link

toggle-modal.title: Update client status
toggle-modal.description: Updates a clients status. Deactivated clients cannot log in to the system
toggle-modal.toast-success: The clients status has been updated

toggle-action-errors.client-not-updated: An error occurred when updating the clients status

delete-modal.title: Delete client
delete-modal.description: This action is permanent. All data associated with the client will be deleted and cannot be reversed

delete-action-errors.client-not-deleted: An error occurred when deleting the client

update-action-errors.client-not-updated: An error occurred when updating the client information
